## Insert cool plot here
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

# made-up data
df <- data.frame(
  Category = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
  Value = c(42, 67, 89, 55)   # you can change these numbers
)

# cool plot
ggplot(df, aes(x = Category, y = Value, fill = Category)) +
  geom_col(color = "steelblue") +
  geom_text(aes(label = Value), vjust = -0.5, size = 5) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "plasma") +
  labs(
    title = "Cool Test Plot with Made-up Data",
    x = "Category",
    y = "Value"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14)
```
